This is awesome Steve - lost this vinyl about 15 years ago. So often stuff of this vintage just doesn't cut it any more but this is a real treat to hear again. 

Po-faced goths need to hear this - pure Pagan magic. Thanks again
Huge thanks for this! Have it on vinyl, but it's rather old and crackly!
